thread.title_full: PASA: PASA invoked against preacher Rajkot: Junagadh police booked Islamic preacher Mufti Salman Azhari | Rajkot News - Times of India

title: PASA: PASA invoked against preacher Rajkot: Junagadh police booked Islamic preacher Mufti Salman Azhari |
text: Rajkot: Junagadh police booked Islamic preacher Mufti Salman Azhari under PASA (Prevention of Anti-Social Activities Act) and detained him from Sabarmati jail. Azhari who was arrested for alleged hate speeches in different towns of the state was shifted to Vadodara Central Jail. Azhari was arrested from Mumbai by Junagadh police with the help of the Gujarat anti-terrorist squad (ATS) on Feb 4 after he was booked for delivering a provocative speech at a function in Junagadh on Jan 31. Subsequently, he was arrested by Kutch police for similar speech. Junagadh police had sent a request to the district collector for imposing PASA against Azhari stating this was to ensure that even after being released on bail, the accused does not indulge in similar activities. The district collector approved the proposal.Student accuses teachers of hurling caste remarksRajkot: A 20-year-old nursing student from Rajkot, Sunil Parmar registered a complaint against his teachers under the SC/ST (prevention) of Atrocity Act on Wednesday. He accused the teachers of hurling casteist slurs at him. In his complaint file with Gandhigram police station, the student has accused Jay Joshi, Manan Joshi, Lucky and one unknown person of hurling caste-based abuses. The student stated that on Feb 20 he was asked to write an apology for being late for morning prayer. Even though the student agreed to apologize the accused abused him and took him to the principal, who called his father. According to the complaint, Joshi and others also assaulted him. We recently4 students arrested for hurling petrol bomb at college gateTrichy rural district police arrested four students, Pavithran, Jeeva, Pradeesh, and Kabilan, from Kannanur near Thuraiyur. Jambunathapuram police caught them for hurling molotov cocktail at the college entrance after a faculty member organized a job fair and the student threw stones.107738832Father of student who killed self files complaint against school principalA father filed a complaint against the principal of Army Public School for alleged abetment to suicide. Police registered a case. The English teacher called the boy's mother regarding the admit card. The principal demanded a fine for a broken chair and insulted the mother and scolded the boy.107927832Man arrested for hurling crude bombP Karan, 21, was arrested for throwing a molotov cocktail into Abdul Rasheed's house in Erukkancheri. The incident was a result of a dispute over unpaid rent. Karan, who was enraged and drunk, caused a fire, damaging Rasheed's house.107788458
